frontmatter.description: Notifies the user program when an item is deleted from one of the SOLIDWORKS Design tree structures (for example, the FeatureManager design tree or the ConfigurationManager tree).

title: DAssemblyDocEvents_DeleteItemNotifyEventHandler
description: Notifies the user program when an item is deleted from one of the SOLIDWORKS Design tree structures (for example, the FeatureManager design tree or the ConfigurationManager tree).
